# AIVUValidator

**Structure**

A type to validate existing AIVU files to ensure that they meet the minimum requirements for AIV.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AIVUValidator
```

## Overview

An AIVU is a standalone media file with the one or more video and audio tracks, and AIV required static and dynamic metadata.

## Type Methods

- **validate(url:)**: Validates the AIVU file given its URL. It throws an error message with error details, if any.

items.description: Validates the AIVU file given its URL. It throws an error message with error details, if any.
items.name: validate(url:)
